crumbs.text: Pilot tests at the Rosneft site

lead.title: Pilot tests at the Rosneft site
lead.description: One of the measures for import substitution and localization is pilot testing of products of Russian manufacturers at the Company's sites to confirm the products’ technical readiness.

list.title: Pilot testing is performed to allow new equipment/technologies to be used in production activities and is carried out in the following cases:
items: New equipment/technology is offered on the market but has no experience of using in the Rosneft Group companies – to confirm the declared technical and other characteristics.

New equipment/technology is offered on the market and has experience of using in the Company, but in significantly different geological, technical and/or technological conditions - to confirm the applicability of new equipment/technologies in specific geological, technical and/or technological conditions of the Rosneft Group companies.

New equipment/technology is in the stage of development completion, there is confirmation of its operability within the framework of bench/factory/laboratory tests, there is no experience of using new equipment/technologies in industrial (field) conditions – for testing new technologies (new equipment), adapting to the conditions of the Rosneft Group Companies, obtaining by the Group of competitive advantages from the market-leading introduction new equipment/technologies.

contactsForm.title: Send a request
contactsForm.text: If you are interested in pilot testing of new equipment/technologies at the Company’s sites, prepare an official appeal to Rosneft signed by the head.
